desc_debug: Write developer debug-level messages to log
desc_info: Write info, warning, and error messages to log
desc_refresh: Force refresh of base namespace from config files
desc_saskan_eyes: Saskan Eyes - Admin GUI for whole Ball of Wax
desc_target: Desired parent location of Saskan Eyes app
desc_traced: Write trace-level msgs to log, w/ docstrings
desc_tracef: Write trace-level msgs to log, w/o docstrings
desc_warn: Write warning, error messages to log, not info msgs
